choices.D: GET VPN with COOP key server
choices.B: GET VPN with dual group member

discussion.content: "GDOI" indicates GETVPN and the command "redundancy" is what specifies this as a COOP Server.
B is right answer here is not doubt D is not correct because in ikev2 policy we set proposal not set anykind of mismatch statement so B right anwser

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit. What is the problem with the IKEv2 site-to-site VPN tunnel?
//IMG//

questions.answer_description:
FlexVPN use IPSec/IKEv2, SSL use TLS
"vpn-tunnel-protocol ikev2 ssl-client’ is part of FlexVPN configuration …the configuration for SSL would be "vpn-tunnel-protocol ssl-client"
Reference: http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security/anyconnect-secure-mobility-client/115735-acssl-ip-config-00.html

discussion.content: The 'vpn-tunnel-protocol ikev2 ssl-client' command allows both ikev2 and SSL

RDP2, SSH, and VNC (Not shown: ICA, RDP, POST and Telnet) are Valid Plug-ins
https://i.imgur.com/bTXTJiv.png

questions.question_text: Which three plugins are available for clientless SSL VPN? (Choose three.)
Which two command are included in the command show dmvpn detail? (Choose two.)
questions.answer_description: show dmvpn detail" returns the output of show ip nhrp nhs, show dmvpn, and show crypto session detail http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/security-vpn/ dynamic-multi-point-vpn-dmvpn/116957-technote-dmvpn-00.html

discussion.content:
Displays detail DMVPN information for each session, including Next Hop Server (NHS) and NHS status, crypto session information, and socket details. 
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/security/s1/sec-s1-cr-book/sec-cr-s4.html
